summary: She lives in her own house. It was made from scratch by me. And will buy and sell items from you anywhere.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#6fa8dc][u][b][size=5][color=#f4f4f4]Destiny, a Nord with her own custom home[/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=4]Will now buy and sell items anywhere[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][/color][/size][/b][/u][/color][/font][color=#6fa8dc][color=#ffff00].
(update .ESP required[/color])

[color=#f4f4f4]This is a stand alone follower, shes a female Nord named Destiny.[/color] [color=#ffff00]She can be found in her own house right next door to The Bannered Mare in Whiterun[/color].

[color=#ff00ff][size=5][b][u]Her home is a reset zone, don't leave anything you want to keep in there.[/u][/b][/size][/color]


Â  [color=#ffff00][b][u]Her combat style allows her to dual wield one handed weapons.[/u][/b][/color] [color=#f4f4f4]She can be marrried, and is essential. Her default armor is Seranas Vampire armor,
but of course you can give her better sets.[/color] [color=#ffff00]I gave her a tattoo on her back, its a set of fairy wings[/color]. [color=#f4f4f4]with her default hair though its mostly covered. Ive uploaded a picture of it anyway. She uses a KS Hairdos and a
CBBE body. Also eyes from "The eyes of Beauty" mod. Her face and body were shaped by me using [size=3]Racemenu[/size] and [size=3]Bodyslide[/size].
She is wearing the sleek steel armor mod with the blue textures in the pictures, the link is:
[b][u][color=#ffff00]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24065/?[/color][/u][/b]
I didnt include it because it wasnt mine to upload
If you like her, dont forget to leave a comment and add you own photos too the page. If you find Anything wrong with her house please let me know ASAP,
thank you.

[color=#ffff00][size=3][u]Tools used[/u][/size][/color][color=#ffff00]:[/color]
[i][b]Racemenu
Bodyslide
Nifscope
Nifmerge[/b][/i]
[size=4][i][b][u]
[color=#ffff00]Credits for original mod makers[/color][/u][/b][/i][color=#ffff00][u][i][b]:[/b][/i][/u][/color][/size]

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Ousnius and Caliente
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam
KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/color][/color][/center][center][/center]
author: UrValdBagina
